snippet.title: Horror Pinball Bundle - PlayStation 4 Gameplay
snippet.description:
Horror Pinball Bundle is built from the Unity Asset Store and (somehow) made it on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5. And while some can make something original out of the pre-made assets by adding your own custom-made ones, I am not 100% sure if this is the case.

Rather than being a bundle in a traditional sense, it was a standalone game with its own trophy list. The tables included were originally sold separately and all had their own trophy lists. But on the bright side, you do get both PS4 and PS5 versions for the price of one, which is often the case with Super PowerUp Games' pinball titles.

Chapters:
00:00 - Intro
01:08 - Halloween Pinball
03:56 - Mummy Pinball
06:03 - Werewolf Pinball

Horror Pinball Bundle (C) Super PowerUp Games S.L.

#horror #horrorpinballbundle #pinball #ps4 #playstation4 #superpowerupgames #theforeseenarcade
